thread.title: Royal London posts 17 percent rise in full-year operating profit

title: Royal London posts 17 percent rise in full-year operating profit
text:
March 29, 2018 / 6:12 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago Royal London posts 17 percent rise in full-year operating profit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
LONDON (Reuters) - Royal London, the UKâ€™s largest mutual life insurance and pensions company, on Thursday posted a 17 percent rise in full-year operating profit, driven by a increase in new business across its insurance and savings businesses. 
The company said operating profit before tax on a European Embedded Value basis, a key measure of performance, was 329 million pounds ($463.46 million), up from 282 million pounds in 2016. Reporting by Simon Jessop. Editing by Clara Denina
